content: Chen Loong is an optional opponent who has their own quest, which you can find shortly after leaving Turtle Rock for the North Shore of the Bitter Lake. From the Shrine, head left while facing it to head along the lakeshore toward a lone shack by the water.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chen_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Chen Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Chen Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Chen Loong is an optional opponent who has their own quest, which you can find shortly after leaving Turtle Rock for the North Shore of the Bitter Lake. From the Shrine, head left while facing it to head along the lakeshore toward a lone shack by the water.
